review_body: I like this game. It is cute and fun. It just has some bugs. Like, it won’t or can’t for some reason fetch my friends from Facebook, it crashes when I go to the Game Center, and I’ve tried numerous times to download the tiny monsters game for the crystals via the task that was given but it doesn’t r...Full ReviewI like this game. It is cute and fun. It just has some bugs. Like, it won’t or can’t for some reason fetch my friends from Facebook, it crashes when I go to the Game Center, and I’ve tried numerous times to download the tiny monsters game for the crystals via the task that was given but it doesn’t redirect me to a downloadable link. So then I downloaded it separately and it won’t recognize that I’ve downloaded it, so the task just sits there never going away.

I love this game! I had it once several years ago and decided to get it again, by far one of my best decisions in mobile games. The only think i dont like is that everything with crystals is so expensive! Even to buy extra crystals, you dont get a lot with what you pay and there arent many chances t...Full ReviewI love this game! I had it once several years ago and decided to get it again, by far one of my best decisions in mobile games. The only think i dont like is that everything with crystals is so expensive! Even to buy extra crystals, you dont get a lot with what you pay and there arent many chances to get free crystals. Other than the crystals its an absolutely adorable and addictive game?

Good game, it's just a shame it hasn't been updated. Tapjoy doesn't exist anymore so the free coins and crystals isn't an option. Gifting doesn't work. Coins are very hard to build up until you get the dinosaurs so people lose interest. But I love it, it gets me thinking
I love me some cute little dinos, but paired with world building? Fantastic! The game crashes sometimes, and I'm not sure if its the fault of my device or otherwise. Other than that, amazing!
Cute game. One thing, though. The game used to change the theme every month or two. Now, it appears to be stuck on "Rodeo" for at least 5 months.

Still love this game, just as good as it was when I first started playing all those years ago! App shuts every now and again but it opens back up a couple seconds before it closed so you don't lose anything if this happens

Very disappointed I've been playing this game for about 7 years and I've always enjoyed it but I've noticed in the last few  years you're no longer uploading new things it seems like you don't even care about the game anymore the only thing you seem to care about is having people put money into it without you doing a...Full ReviewI've been playing this game for about 7 years and I've always enjoyed it but I've noticed in the last few  years you're no longer uploading new things it seems like you don't even care about the game anymore the only thing you seem to care about is having people put money into it without you doing anything new to the game or for the game or the people playing it. I understand you have other games that need your attention but you need to be loyal to the people who play Tiny Village.

The game is fun, but does have glitches that need to be worked out. I appreciate that there is opportunity to play through the goals, just taking a little bit more time, when you don't have many crystals. I don't mind making in app purchases, but because it isn't so forced, I will be more likely to ...Full ReviewThe game is fun, but does have glitches that need to be worked out. I appreciate that there is opportunity to play through the goals, just taking a little bit more time, when you don't have many crystals. I don't mind making in app purchases, but because it isn't so forced, I will be more likely to buy crystals and continue playing. I would give it another star for just a little more excitement

Great game! I really like these types of games. With no real competition, it is a good casual game to just make a happy little village and watch it grow. Overall, I really like Tiny Village. But there are some things that kept me from a full 5 stars. First of all, it is really hard to get coins in the beginning...Full ReviewI really like these types of games. With no real competition, it is a good casual game to just make a happy little village and watch it grow. Overall, I really like Tiny Village. But there are some things that kept me from a full 5 stars. First of all, it is really hard to get coins in the beginning because of the lack of income. At level 5, you get the annual quests which uses a lot of coins. The other reason is that most things dont have build times listed, which is harder to plan.

BEWARE OF TINYCO GAMES This game is a sad situation. The game itself is very entertaining. It really is a classic, fun and addicting game without the usual complexity and cynicism of most modern mobile games. Unfortunately Tinyco doesnt treat it with respect and continue new content. Just because a game is older shouldnt ...Full ReviewThis game is a sad situation. The game itself is very entertaining. It really is a classic, fun and addicting game without the usual complexity and cynicism of most modern mobile games. Unfortunately Tinyco doesnt treat it with respect and continue new content. Just because a game is older shouldnt mean it gets thrown away. People still play Doom from 1990..why? Its a classic. This is a classic for mobile games. Hopefully Tinyco will realize this is a classic worth keeping around!

Seriously?? I had this game on my phone a while back and I loved it but it wouldn't show houses and dinosaurs etc. So I got rid of it and waited for a while, wth is up with this game?? Haven't even built four houses and it's force closing nonstop. This needs to be fixed or you're gonna lose ALOT of customers.

Game is fun. Support ruins it. 3/5 because the game is great. I've loved it for years. Played on two old phones and had to restart each time due to lack of support with moving games. It's worth playing however. It may seem or look stupid, but the Flintstones like village builder is fun. Lol.

Bingo and Support I used to love this game and always heard back from support. My last 3 support requests have been ignored and now the game is telling me I'm ineligible for bingo. Absolutely frustrating and again the support team is no where to be found. Bingo is just about the only thing to look forward to when you...Full ReviewI used to love this game and always heard back from support. My last 3 support requests have been ignored and now the game is telling me I'm ineligible for bingo. Absolutely frustrating and again the support team is no where to be found. Bingo is just about the only thing to look forward to when you've been playing for over 2 years. Very disappointing TinyCo.

Customer service has disappeared I've been a longtime loyal player with no problems with customer service or transferring my game till now. I've been trying for well over a month with nothing. Sucks because I really love this game and wish I could play again. 1 star till I get a response
TAKES WAY TO LONG TO LEVEL UP! Gets boringly after a while. I wish there was a way to send messages/communicate to people you play with... like Team Lava games.

Love the game but fix the freezing problem. Love the game but if I'm in it more than 5 minutes it freezes and I have to force close it. Waiting for an update to fix this bug because it's really annoying. Also, bingo claims I'm not eligible. Please, please fix these problems because I want to keep playing!

Lost game I hadn't been on here in about 2 days then I came back to see that my village has been swapped with someone else. This has frustrated me because I was at a high level over 70. Very unimpressed!

Bingo game doesn't work What happened to the neon raptor? Last update tuned it into a tiny non articulated blip that slides around in a small square.  Hope the next bingo works. Oct.1. The game is going down the tubes. Used to love it. So many things wrong now that I am going to uninstall. Sad

Very upset Worked fine for a while,.now it won't let me collect any coins. Constantly stops. Does tinyco even care? This is the 3rd game from them I've uninstalled due to lack of updates on games. Very, very disappointed.

Micro management at its finest. Love this game and its perfect for those few mins between tasks. Only thing i dont like is they push for you to buy things from their market, but as it is a free game they have to make money somehow so i wont bring down the rating by any stars.

Big surprise another app screwed by an update. And as usually not willing to fix it .oh well.good luck with keeping your users. Look at that not even acknowledging they have a problem. At least when Fairy Farm had issues they acknowledge it and fixed it right away.

Can't transfer to a new device without contacting support...going to a smarter group for games since these idiots can't set it up so you can just log in with you email and a password. Cant purchase anything else app has to be updated google play does not support app billing  method. Please fix! Lost all my previous progress ph broke. Set the app to recognize you by email n password like most of games outhere. Please fix to earn 5 starts.
Addicting game Playing on a Nexus 7, recently updated to Lollipop and now can't access the game. Sucks you cannot easily transfer to another device. I think I'm done with it..... Too frustrating!

my village Love the game. Been playing for a number of years now. Every so often thou I loose my progress and have to start over. But hopefully no more. I guess I was wrong because the game will not update and it stops when I get to level 31

This game used to be amazing until they just stopped acting like this game and the money that it's players have given them mattered.

Bingo Need to keep the bingo game. Also before coins or rubies (whatever they are) are spent it should ask if your sure and you should have the option to take back your past purchases like expanding. And its ridiculous how much it is to expand. Thank you for your time.

Changed my rating... I was absolutetly addicted to this game! The game was and still is fun..(IF) you don't buy or try to earn crystals. If the purchace or "action required" to receive crystals does not go through Tinyco does not respond! Contrary to my original opinion of their customer service which was GREAT..always ...Full ReviewI was absolutetly addicted to this game! The game was and still is fun..(IF) you don't buy or try to earn crystals. If the purchace or "action required" to receive crystals does not go through Tinyco does not respond! Contrary to my original opinion of their customer service which was GREAT..always a prompt response..now no response at all. My rating would easily be 5 again if this major glitch was given the proper attention.

I'm up to level 52 and I never...Full ReviewThis game is so much fun! love it! disappointingly I've had crash issues off n on, and once 72 crystals went mysteriously missing. I'm up to level 52 and I never want to stop building my cool little village! :)
